title: Nova China
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Opened since 1973, specializes in ta raditional Chinese food.
Has daily and a la carte menus marks the vegetarian choices, of which some may be vegan or can be made vegan. Almost all dishes are made-to-order. Staff is aware of what is and what isn't vegan, so be sure and inquire, especially about soups, Chinese rolls and others.
